rules.name: heading
link
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const href = node.getAttribute('href'); return '[' + content + '](' + href + ')'; }

rules.name: image
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const alt = node.getAttribute('alt') || ''; const src = node.getAttribute('src') || ''; return '![' + alt + '](' + src + ')'; }

rules.name: listItem
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const parent = node.parentNode; const index = Array.prototype.indexOf.call(parent.children, node) + 1; return (parent.nodeName === 'OL' ? index + '. ' : '- ') + content.trim() + '\n'; }

rules.name: codeBlock
rules.replacement:
function(content, node) { const code = node.querySelector('code'); const language = code ? code.getAttribute('class') || '' : ''; const languageMatch = language.match(/language-(\w+)/); const lang = languageMatch ? languageMatch[1] : ''; return '
```' + lang + '
' + (code ? code.textContent : content) + '
```
'; }

rules.name: table
rules.replacement:
function(content, node) { const headerRow = node.querySelector('thead tr'); const rows = Array.from(node.querySelectorAll('tbody tr')); let markdown = '

'; if (headerRow) { const headerCells = Array.from(headerRow.querySelectorAll('th')); const headers = headerCells.map(cell => cell.textContent.trim()); markdown += '| ' + headers.join(' | ') + ' |
| ' + headers.map(() => '---').join(' | ') + ' |
'; } rows.forEach(row => { const cells = Array.from(row.querySelectorAll('td')); markdown += '| ' + cells.map(cell => cell.textContent.trim()).join(' | ') + ' |
'; }); const caption = node.querySelector('caption'); if (caption) { markdown += '
*' + caption.textContent.trim() + '*
'; } const tfoot = node.querySelector('tfoot'); if (tfoot) { markdown += '
*' + tfoot.textContent.trim() + '*
'; } return markdown; }

rules.name: ruby
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const rt = node.querySelector('rt'); if (rt) { const baseText = content.replace(rt.textContent || '', '').trim(); return baseText + ' (' + rt.textContent + ')'; } return content; }

rules.name: abbr
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const title = node.getAttribute('title'); return title ? content + ' (' + title + ')' : content; }

rules.name: data
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const value = node.getAttribute('value'); return value ? content + ' (' + value + ')' : content; }

rules.name: fieldset
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const legend = node.querySelector('legend'); return (legend ? legend.textContent + '\n' : '') + content; }

rules.name: input
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const type = node.getAttribute('type') || 'text'; const id = node.getAttribute('id') || ''; const placeholder = node.getAttribute('placeholder') || ''; return placeholder ? placeholder + '  ' : '  '; }

rules.name: select
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const options = Array.from(node.querySelectorAll('option')).map(option => option.textContent).join(', '); return options ? options + '  ' : '  '; }

rules.name: optgroup
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const label = node.getAttribute('label'); return label ? label + ': ' + content : content; }

rules.name: textarea
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const placeholder = node.getAttribute('placeholder') || ''; return placeholder ? placeholder + '  ' : '  '; }

rules.name: label
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const forAttr = node.getAttribute('for'); return content + (forAttr ? '  ' : ''); }

rules.name: svg
rules.replacement: function(content, node) { const figcaption = node.closest('figure')?.querySelector('figcaption'); const caption = figcaption ? figcaption.textContent : 'A chart'; return '\n*' + caption + '*\n'; }
